p: Nishida and co-workers synthesized thymol derivatives 37â€“ 40 for antifungal potency against Aspergillus niger, Aspergillus oryzae, Fusarium oxysporum, and Alternaria alternate. The antitumor tests showed that 2-isopropyl-5-methylphenyl 5-phenylfuran-2-carboxylate 37 exhibits promising activity against Bel-7402 and KB. Dithymyl ethylene ether thymol derivative 39 shows the highest antifungal activity against A. niger ( Figure 10) [ 38].
